title: Sobek
description:
Small standing bronze statuette, probably of Sebek. Double Crown and uraeus. Left arm and foot advanced. Short kilt. No inscription.

Condition: Fair. Details of crown broken. Attributes missing from hands. Apparently they have been lost recently for the catalogue states that the figure "holds ankh and sceptre". One dowel missing from base. Metal in good condition.
